title: Contact Us
subtitle: We'd Love to Hear From You
description: Have questions about our events, interested in speaking opportunities, or want to partner with us? Reach out and our team will get back to you within 24-48 hours.

faq.question: How can I become a speaker at Innovate QA?
faq.answer: Visit our Volunteer page and submit a speaker application. Our program committee reviews all submissions and will contact you if your topic aligns with our conference themes.

faq.question: What sponsorship opportunities are available?
faq.answer: We offer Silver, Bronze, Gold, and Platinum sponsorship tiers with various benefits. Contact us at sponsors@innovateqaevents.com for our sponsorship prospectus.

faq.question: Can I get a refund for my ticket?
faq.answer: Full refunds are available up to 30 days before the event. After that, tickets can be transferred to another attendee. Contact us for assistance.

faq.question: How do I join the Innovate QA community?
faq.answer: Follow us on social media, join our Discord server, and sign up for our newsletter to stay connected with our growing community.
